title: test_adagrad_sparse is flaky
body_html:
Example: https://travis-ci.org/pytorch/pytorch/jobs/232237283

My plan to fix this:

  • Reseed tests at the beginning of each test run to make them more deterministic (e.g., your random seeds won't change if someone adds a new test)
  • Switch test_adagrad_sparse to do coordinate descent, instead of randomly picking x or y direction to travel. This makes it more deterministic (independent of the first bullet point.)

CC @apaszke
